prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.
Character 1
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.
Character 2
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: My boss. He taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.
Character 3
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 4
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons, and the man who raised me. He was a lawyer once.
Character 5
Name: Archie Buff
Description: An archeologist in Kurain Village. He was asked by someone to study the Founder's Orb.
Character 6
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: A member of the Defiant Dragons, and Dhurke's right-hand man. He's always been one to laugh at just about anything.
Character 7
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensics investigator she always wanted to be.
Character 8
Name: Paul Atishon
Description: He's looking to represent Kurain Village. His remarkable self-confidence is blinding.
Character 9
Name: Sergeant Buff → Armie Buff
Description: The doctor's reclusive child. He lost his mother in a fire.
Character 10
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ms. Maya Fey's cousin. She's also one of Kurain Village's spirit mediums. She's always really courteous.
Character 11
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: Mr. Wright's best friend and the district's chief prosecutor. His frilly cravat makes a strong fashion statement.
Character 12
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mr. Wright's former assistant. She's currently training in Khura'in. I'm told she can channel the dead.
Character 13
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the kingdom's second-in-command.
Character 14
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: Daughter of Ga'ran and princess of Khura'in who is more than a little spoiled.
Character 15
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 16
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 17
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Character 18
Name: Amara Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The previous queen. She is a spirit medium known as the grand priestess and possesses incredible spiritual power.
Character 19
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: An aspiring magician and my daughter. I adopted her nine years ago.
Character 20
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.
Character 21
Name: Apollo Justice
Description: A reliable subordinate at my office. Serious and hot-blooded with vocal chords made of steel.
Character 22
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 23
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons and Apollo's adoptive father.
Character 24
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: The Defiant Dragons' XO and Dhurke's right-hand man. He will laugh at just about anything.
Character 25
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensics investigator.
Character 26
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.
Character 27
Name: Maya Fey
Description: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.
Character 28
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice. He was killed during the hostage exchange.
Character 29
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last memories of the dead.
Character 30
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 31
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 32
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: The police have had their eye on Dr. Buff for some time.
Person: Ema
Testimony 1
Testimony: And just today, a number of stolen artifacts were discovered in his study.
Person: Ema
Testimony 2
Testimony: Among them were a priceless urn and a statue that were stolen from the Fey clan.
Person: Ema
Testimony 3
Testimony: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.
Person: Ema
Testimony 4
Testimony: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.
Person: Ema

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Alright, let's tackle this problem step by step. I'm going to look through the evidence and testimonies provided to find a contradiction. 

First, I'll review the **evidences**:

1. **Evidence 0: Attorney's Badge** - This is Phoenix's badge, showing he's a lawyer.
2. **Evidence 1: Founder's Orb** - A national treasure only seen by royals. Heating it revealed the founder's form.
3. **Evidence 2: Photo of My Father** - A photo of Phoenix's biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
4. **Evidence 3: Study Photo** - Shows Dr. Buff in his study, covered by books.
5. **Evidence 4: Study Diagram** - Diagram of the study with a bookcase and window.
6. **Evidence 5: Research Notes** - Notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box with the Founder's Orb.
7. **Evidence 6: Orb Transfer Agreement** - A contract stating Dr. Buff will hand over the Orb if unharmed.
8. **Evidence 7: Sarge's Drone** - A drone operated by Dr. Buff's son, equipped with a camera and microphone.
9. **Evidence 8: Glowing Moss** - Found on Dr. Buff's boot, likely from hiding the Orb.
10. **Evidence 9: E-Mail** - A reply email from Dr. Buff about his research into the Orb.
11. **Evidence 10: Doctor's Reading Glasses** - Found on his desk, indicating poor eyesight.
12. **Evidence 11: Raincoat** - Worn by Dr. Buff the night of the murder, with a distinctive design.
13. **Evidence 12: Robbery Report** - Filed by Dr. Buff a year ago for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
14. **Evidence 13: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report** - Died between 10-11 PM, struck by an object.
15. **Evidence 14: Armie's Statement** - Fled to her room when someone moved her while she was unconscious.
16. **Evidence 15: Inga's Autopsy Report** - Stabbed from behind, time of death around 3 PM.
17. **Evidence 16: Tomb Diagram** - Diagram of the crime scene with Amara's sarcophagus in the center.
18. **Evidence 17: Tomb Crime Photo** - Inga was stabbed in the back with a knife.
19. **Evidence 18: Gemstone** - Found in the tomb's ashes, caked in soot.
20. **Evidence 19: Pink Butterfly Pendant** - Belongs to Amara, found at the crime scene, stained with Dhurke's blood.
21. **Evidence 20: Mysterious Bloodstain** - Dhurke's blood from Amara's Tomb.
22. **Evidence 21: Painkiller Shots** - Medication Inga used for back pain.
23. **Evidence 22: Inga's Notepad** - Notes on people's characteristics.
24. **Evidence 23: Woman's Photo** - Photo of Dhurke and Amara on the run 23 years ago.
25. **Evidence 24: Channeling Photo** - Taken at 2 PM of the channeling rite.
26. **Evidence 25: Ahlbi's Statement** - At 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
27. **Evidence 26: Amara's Assassination File** - File containing info on Amara's assassination.
28. **Evidence 27: Dhurke's Law Book** - Document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the queen's name.
29. **Evidence 28: Dhurke's Badge** - Symbol of Dhurke's creed, never confiscated by Nahyuta.
30. **Evidence 29: Dhurke's Corpse Photo** - More than three days after death, shot three times in the chest.

Now, let's look at the **testimonies**:

1. **Testimony 0: The police had their eye on Dr. Buff for some time.**
2. **Testimony 1: And just today, a number of stolen artifacts were discovered in his study.**
3. **Testimony 2: Among them were a priceless urn and a statue that were stolen from the Fey clan.**
4. **Testimony 3: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.**
5. **Testimony 4: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.**

Looking for a contradiction, I notice that **Evidence 12: Robbery Report** was filed by Dr. Buff a year ago for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey. However, **Testimony 4** states that Dr. Buff likely stole the relic from the Atishon residence, implying he stole it himself. This directly contradicts the Robbery Report, which indicates he reported the theft, not that he was the thief. 

Therefore, the contradiction is between **Evidence 12** and **Testimony 4**.
</think>

cot:
Alright, let's tackle this problem step by step. I'm given a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies from a legal case involving the death of Minister Inga Karkhuul Khura'in. The goal is to identify which piece of evidence and testimony contradict each other and provide a JSON response as specified.

First, I'll need to carefully review the provided characters, evidences, and testimonies to understand the context of the case. The key elements here are the murder of Minister Inga, the involvement of various characters, and the evidence collected during the investigation.

Looking at the testimonies, there are several statements made by different individuals. One testimony stands out as potentially conflicting with the evidence. Specifically, **Testimony 0** from Person: Atishon states that he was walking alone, lost in thought, and passed by the doctor's house, where he saw Mr. Are'bal fleeing the scene. This testimony suggests that Atishon was present at the doctor's house around 10 PM, which aligns with the time of death mentioned in **Evidence 13: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report**, which states the time of death was between 10 and 11 PM.

However, **Evidence 25: Ahlbi's Statement** contradicts this timeline. Ahlbi claims that at around 2 PM, Shah'do (a different individual) was surprised by a firecracker and stole Nayna's hat. This statement suggests that the event occurred much earlier in the day, around 2 PM, which conflicts with Atishon's testimony of seeing Mr. Are'bal fleeing the scene at 10 PM.

This inconsistency in the timeline between the testimonies and the evidence indicates that either the testimonies are incorrect or the evidence was tampered with after the fact. This directly contradicts the account provided by Atishon, making them incompatible with the evidence from the autopsy report.

Therefore, the pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other are **Evidence 25: Ahlbi's Statement** and **Testimony 0: Atishon's Statement**.
</think>

Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.

Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Papa met with someone the night he died.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 1
Testimony: I didn't have eyes on the ground, as I'd already mounted my siege defense, but...
Person: Sarge
Testimony 2
Testimony: ...I did hear him arguing with someone in his study!
Person: Sarge
Testimony 3
Testimony: From my window, I saw the one designated "Datz" getting ejected from the premises.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 4
Testimony: After that, the man lingered around the perimeter for some time.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 5
Testimony: He must have regrouped and killed my papa in the study later -- I just know it!
Person: Sarge

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Alright, so I'm trying to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. Let's start by looking at the evidence provided. There's a lot here, so I'll need to focus on the key pieces that might be in conflict with each other or with the testimonies.

First, the **Evidence 25: Ahlbi's Statement** says that at around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat. This seems to place Shah'do in the courtyard at that time.

Then, looking at **Testimony 0: Papa met with someone the night he died**, and **Testimony 5: He must have regrouped and killed my papa in the study later -- I just know it!**, it seems like Sarge is convinced that Datz was involved in the murder, given the timing and the fact that he was seen lingering around the perimeter.

Now, looking at the other testimonies and evidence, **Evidence 12: Robbery Report** mentions that Paul Atishon-Wimperson filed a report a year ago for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey. This suggests that there was a previous theft involving valuable items, possibly related to the Fey clan.

**Evidence 13: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report** indicates that Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object, leading to his death between 10 and 11 PM. This suggests that the murder happened later in the evening.

**Testimony 1: I didn't have eyes on the ground, as I'd already mounted my siege defense, but... I did hear him arguing with someone in his study!** and **Testimony 3: From my window, I saw the one designated "Datz" getting ejected from the premises.** These testimonies suggest that Datz was involved in some capacity, possibly arguing with someone in the study before being ejected.

Putting this together, **Evidence 25** places Shah'do in the courtyard at 2 PM, which seems to conflict with **Testimony 5**, which suggests that Datz was involved in the murder later that night. However, **Evidence 12** about the previous theft and **Evidence 13** about the time of death support the idea that Datz was indeed involved, possibly in the study around the time of the murder.

So, the contradiction seems to be between **Evidence 25** and **Testimony 5**, as they both suggest Datz's involvement but at different times. However, considering the other evidence and testimonies, it's more likely that **Testimony 5** aligns better with the timeline provided by **Evidence 13**, making **Evidence 25** the one that contradicts the others.

Therefore, the pair that contradicts each other is **Evidence 25** and **Testimony 5**.
</think>

cot:
Alright, let's tackle this problem step by step. I'm presented with a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies from a fictional scenario involving a murder case. The goal is to identify a pair where evidence contradicts testimony. 

First, I'll need to understand the context. The case involves multiple characters, including Trucy Wright, Athena Cykes, Phoenix Wright, and others, all involved in a murder investigation. There are several pieces of evidence, such as the Attorney's Badge, Founder's Orb, Study Photo, and others, and various testimonies from witnesses.

I'll start by reviewing the evidence and testimonies to see where there might be a discrepancy. 

Looking at the evidence, the **Founder's Orb** is described as a national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in, hidden within a statue. Only the queen knows its true name. The **Study Photo** shows the victim (Dr. Buff) lying in his study, covered in books, with a stained coffee book. The **Study Diagram** describes the layout of the study, noting a bookcase, window, and second-floor area.

Now, examining the testimonies, **Testimony 1** states that Dr. Buff was murdered at around 11 PM, and **Testimony 5** adds that a heavy suitcase was used as a weapon. The **Study Photo** and **Study Diagram** suggest that the study is on the second floor, with a bookcase and window. 

The contradiction arises from the timeline. If Dr. Buff was killed around 11 PM, and the study is on the second floor, the heavy suitcase would have been moved up the stairs. However, the Study Photo and Diagram indicate that the study is on the second floor, implying that the suitcase would have been used to strike Dr. Buff while he was on the second floor. This creates a discrepancy because the Study Photo suggests Dr. Buff was already in the study, possibly implying he was there before the murder, which conflicts with the testimony about the time of death and the use of the suitcase as a weapon.

Therefore, the evidence (Study Photo and Diagram) suggesting the study's location on the second floor and the testimony indicating the time of death and the use of a heavy suitcase for the murder contradict each other.
</think>
